title: Velshi & Ruhle
overview: With cable news caught in a seemingly never-ending cycle of breaking news interrupted by more breaking news interrupted by yet more breaking news, MSNBC anchors Stephanie Ruhle and Ali Velshi found themselves talking about stories that were important but getting swept away in the flurry of bombshells about the Trump White House. Ruhle and Velshi will get to escape the frantic news cycle and talk about those big issues in their new show.The show is called MSNBC Live with Velshi and Ruhl Monday - Friday and airs from 11 AM to Noon. The show is called Velshi and Ruhl on Saturday and it airs from 12:30 PM to 1 PM.
